abstract: Whole Foods Market says same-store sales growth slowed in third quarter to 1.3 percent; income was $154 million, or 43 cents a share, up 2 percent from year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: Whole Foods Market said same-store sales growth slowed as it battled competition in the organic grocery category that it dominates.

headline.main: Decelerating Same-Store Sales at Whole Foods Cause Sell-Off
headline.print_headline: Decelerating Same-Store Sales at Whole Foods Causes Sell-Off

snippet: Whole Foods Market said same-store sales growth slowed as it battled competition in the organic grocery category that it dominates.
